short_summary: E60PV-20DENT Dental Supplies, Instruments, Equipment, Parts, Accessories, Services
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and submitted arrangements will be evaluated upon submission. All arrangements submitted after January 1st, 2032 ET will result in the arrangement being declared non-responsive. Canada has a requirement to establish a Supply Arrangement and Standing Offer sub-agreement for the supply and delivery of Dental Supplies, Dental Instruments, Small and Large Dental Equipment, Parts, Accessories and Services, on an \u201cas and when\u201d required basis for the Government of Canada departments identified in Schedule I, I.1, II and III of the Financial Administration Act.
full_summary:
# E60PV-20DENT Dental Supplies, Instruments, Equipment, Parts, Accessories, Services RFSA
#### Solicitation Information
- **Reference Number**: WS3749700983
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3749700983
- **Publication Date**: April 21st, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 1st, 2032 at 2:00 PM EDT

#### Tender Details
- **Notice Type**: Request for Supply Arrangement
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and other trade agreements (view the full list in the annex)
- **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Goods and Services Required
The Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to provide dental supplies, instruments, equipment, parts, accessories, and services on an “as and when” required basis for various government departments across Canada. The required goods and services include, but are not limited to:

- Dental equipment and supplies
- Dental services
- Maintenance and repair services for dental equipment

#### Submission and Evaluation
All required supporting documentation and submitted arrangements will be evaluated once received. All arrangements submitted after January 1st, 2032 ET will result in the arrangement being declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information
Contracting Officer:
Cindy O'Gorman (SPAC/PSPC)
(Email: [cindy.ogorman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:cindy.ogorman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca))
(Phone: Not available)

View the tender posting and submit your response at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16067731?extsite=MTYwNjc3MzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
---

The following is a list of trade agreements:
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CK
